title: Was ZZ Top's drummer influenced by John Bonham? - Quora

response.answer_text: Frank Beard was already playing in Texas bands before Led Zeppelin released their debut album in 1968. So, Bonzo probably wasn’t a big influence. But Bonzo and Beard were both influenced by a lot of the same blues acts.
Not really… Would rather say he seems to be influenced by metronomes and the one having influenced someone to invent the drum machine.
